summary: The unclear and complicated twists between governal powers, independentist party and Mafia in the Sicily of the '40s culminate with the death of Salvatore Giuliano.
cast: Salvo Randone|Frank Wolff|Pippo Agusta|Sennuccio Benelli|Giuseppe Calandra|Pietro Cammarata|Max Cartier|Nando Cicero|Pietro Franzone|Giovanni Gallina|Vincenzo Norvese|Renato Pinciroli|Francesco Rosi|Mno Sorgi|Giuseppe Teti|Cosimo Torino|Ugo Torrente|Bruno Ukmar|Frederico Zardi
keywords: shot in a bed|firefight|post war italy|sentence|judgment
title: Salvatore Giuliano
